item.title: Analytical Techniques
item.description: Description: Guest Joel Fried demonstrates the tools of the PokerTracker software in this lecture. Instructor: Joel Fried

item.title: Basic Strategy
item.description: Description: Position, pot odds, implied odd, fold equity, and semi-bluffing strategies are discussed in this lecture, and several examples are analyzed. Instructor: Kevin Desmond

item.title: Decision Making
item.description: Description: In this session, guest Matt Hawrilenko discusses game theory, value betting and bluffing, how to maximize the value of the entire set of hands, and exploitive strategies. Instructor: Matt Hawrilenko

item.title: Game Theory
item.description: Description: Guest Bill Chen discusses Cepheus, explains regret minimization, Counterfactual Regret, and improvements, and the extension of computer solutions to other games including big bet and multi-player games. Instructor: Bill Chen

item.title: Introduction to Poker Theory
item.description: Description: An overview of the course requirements, expectations, software used for tournaments, advanced techniques, and some basics tools and concepts for the class are discussed in this lecture. Instructor: Kevin Desmond

item.title: Lecture Videos
item.description: Introduction to Poker Theory Analytical Techniques Basic Strategy Preflop Analysis Tournament Play Poker Economics Game Theory Decision Making

item.title: Poker Economics
item.description: Description: Guest Aaron Brown discusses the history of poker, its influence on futures trading in nineteenth century United States. Instructor: Aaron Brown

item.title: Preflop Analysis
item.description: Description: This lecture focuses on how to play the pre-flop as close to optimally as possible by analyzing several scenarios. Instructor: Kevin Desmond

item.title: Tournament Play
item.description: Description: In this session Kevin Desmond discusses the tournament life cycle, flop-turn-river play, poker psychology, bankroll management, and the class league results. Instructor: Kevin Desmond
